altername_name: Bokujou Monogatari GB3: Boy Meets Girl
Bokujou Monogatari 3 GB: Boy Meets Girl
name: Harvest Moon 3 GBC
overview: After much acclaim for your past farming accomplishments, you are asked by a young girl to help her get her farm up and running. The farm, situated on an island, needs plenty of work, so you need all your skills to get things working correctly. Your many tasks range from tending to the farm animals, keeping an eye on the budget while purchasing goods at the local stores, and so forth. And although the main aim is to build and maintain the farm, there are plenty of opportunities to take care of yourself (go to the movies, buy pets, find a girlfriend/boyfriend).
